name: Intimacy - an introspective drawing
description:
Intimacy is an Virtual Reality experience and a poetical journey for HTC Vive. Through a unique relationship between drawing and virtual reality Intimacy takes you on an introspective journey. Led by a beautifully narrated story you'll be taken on a spiritual Journey. The environment and assets being built and hand drawn in a Virtual Reality world set you in an unseen univers. Grab your headset and follow us into this poetical world...

A big Thanks to Danijel Zambo for the music ( Danijel Zambo - Silence)
